動物用藥品名稱: 海博萊雞新城病不活化疫苗(LASOTA株)
業者名稱: 西班牙商海博萊大藥廠股份有限公司台灣分公司
ingredients: ACTIVE INGREDIENT: INACTIVE NDV, STRAIN LA SOTA >= 10^8EID50;CONSTITUENTS OF THE ADJUVANT: MINERAL OIL 89.8MG; POLYSORBATE 801.1MG; SORBITAN MONOOLEATE 6.8MG; PGE-8 DIOLEATE 4.2MG;CONSTITUENTS OF THE EXCIPIENT: THIOMERSAL 0.02MG; WATER FORINJECTIONS 加至0.2ML.
